Name: OMICRON: Coronavirus Battlegrounds
About the game: People are tired of sitting at home, so naturally they go for a mass walk in the nearest park. But there is a problem - one of them turned out to be infected with COVID-19, and now the safety of other citizens is under attack! Take control of one of these guys. Run away from sources of infection to win, or infect healthy folks to prevent them from breaking ahead! Features Super-dynamic multiplayer up to 16 players, allowing you to dive into the crazy gameplay; A variety of boosts that provide different perks for both sides - find a mask and get temporary protection, or take a pill and start sneezing with even more deadly molecules; A lot of parks from around the world, recreated from real satellite images; And most importantly - unique skins.
